hero.reality: Reality with Every Line of Code.

aboutMe.description: Hey there! I'm Daniil, a web developer. I wrote a backend on Node.js for working with DBMS and frontend on React + Redux for working with the client. I also created logos, designs and 3D models. I'm interested in information technology and how it's changing the world.

about.creating: creating harmony between code and design.
about.description: Hey there! I'm Daniil, a web developer. I wrote a backend on Node.js for working with DBMS and frontend on React + Redux for working with the client. I also created logos, designs and 3D models. I'm interested in information technology and how it's changing the world.
about.team: I'm eager to learn new things and develop. I want to create new useful things and share them with the world, so I will be glad to join a friendly strong team!
